summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 CHEVROLET SILVERADO 1500. WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 20 MPH, THE STEERING SEIZED WHEN THE BRAKE PEDAL WAS DEPRESSED. ALSO, THE STABILITRAK WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE CONTACT CALLED VANDERGRIFF CHEVROLET (LOCATED AT 1200 W INTERSTATE 20, ARLINGTON, ARLINGTON, TEXAS 76017) WHO STATED THAT THE REMEDY WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE VIN WAS ASSOCIATED WITH A STEERING RECALL. THE NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 63,000. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
